short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A11ywatch chrome extension to run accessibility reports for websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the active tab for accessibility issues, performance, and more. Get detailed reports on WCAG issues and insight on how to fix. This chrome extension requires a valid a11ywatch.com API key in order to run detailed real world accessibility reports and vitals.
